  <script>
   var windowModalsLists = {
        list: [],
        show: function () {
            var showFirst = true;
            $.each(windowModalsLists.list, function (k, wind) {
                try {
                    if (showFirst && typeof(window[wind]) == 'object') {
                        window[wind].show();
                        delete windowModalsLists.list[k];
                        showFirst = false;
                    }
                } catch (e) {
                    console.log(e);
                }
            });
        }
    };
  </script>

  <script>
   $('#forgot-password-modal .btn-signin-submit').on('click', function () {
        var email = $('#forgot-password-modal input[name="email"]');
        if(email.val() == ''){
            email.addClass('validate-error');
            return false;
        }
    })
  </script>

  <script>
   $('select[name=city]').on('change', function(){
    // $('#companyInfo_city_chosen').show();
    // $('#companyInfo_city').show();
    $('#new_city').remove();
});

$('select[name=city], select[name="exhibitor_info[company][city]"]').on('change', function(){
    var id_selection = $(this).val(),
        t = this;
    if (id_selection == -1) {
        $(this).hide();
        $('#companyInfo_city_chosen').hide();
        /* $(this).parent().append(
        '<div class="input-group" id="new_city">'+
        '<input type="text" value="" name="new_city" class="form-control" placeholder="Add new City">'+
        '<span class="input-group-btn">'+
        '<button class="btn" type="button"><i class="material-icons">check</i></button>'+
        '</span>'+
        '</div>'
        ); */
        $(this).parent().append(
        '<div class="input-group" id="new_city">'+
            '<input type="text" value="" name="new_city" placeholder="' + _('add-new-city', 'Add new City') +'" class="form-group__input form-group__input_right-icon">'+
            '<div class="input-group-append">'+
                '<button class="input-group-text" type="button">'+
                    '<i class="material-icons">check</i>'+
                '</button>'+
            '</div>'+
        '</div>'
        );
        $('#new_city input').focus();
    }

    $('#new_city button').on('click', function(){
        if($('#new_city input').val() == '') {
            $.alert({'title': 'Warning', 'content': '<b>Add New City</b> field must be filled'});
            return;
        }

        var addCityData = {
            'new_city': $('#new_city input').val(),
            'country_id': $('#country-i').val(),
            'ljJOIkwXQoj7fejgnA': '9nSOt4xUTRakpfImwcjSerDDcP8uGfPDjIwQfNDcP5M'
        };

        var regionVal = $('#region').length ? $('#region').val() : null;
        if( regionVal ) {
            addCityData.region = regionVal;
        }
        
        $.post('/index/addCity', addCityData).success(function(data){
            delete window.cities[$('#country-i').val()];
            $('select[data-toggle="load-cities"]').trigger('change');
            $(t).parent().find('.input-group').remove();
            $(t).data('selected', data.id);
            // $(t).not('[data-place="exhibitor_profile"]').show();
            if( $('#companyInfo_city_chosen').length ) {
                $('#companyInfo_city_chosen').show();
            } else {
                $('#companyInfo_city').show();
            }
			$('#companyInfo_city').trigger( 'chosen:updated' );
        })

    });
});
  </script>

  <script type="text/javascript">
   piAId = '339191';
piCId = '29004';
piHostname = 'pi.pardot.com';
(function() {
	function async_load(){
		var s = document.createElement('script'); s.type = 'text/javascript';
		s.src = ('https:' == document.location.protocol ? 'https://pi' : 'http://cdn') + '.pardot.com/pd.js';
		var c = document.getElementsByTagName('script')[0]; c.parentNode.insertBefore(s, c);
	}
	if(window.attachEvent) { window.attachEvent('onload', async_load); }
	else { window.addEventListener('load', async_load, false); }
})();
  </script>

  <script>

   window.ExpoPlatform = {

            window.ExpoPlatform.translations = {
                thisWebsiteIsUsingCookies: 'This website is using cookies.',
                weUseCookiesToEnsureThatWeGiveYouTheBestExperienceOnOurWebsite: 'We use cookies to ensure that we give you the best experience on our website. If you continue without changing your settings, we will assume that you are happy to receive all cookies on this website.',

  <script type="text/javascript">
   if( window.innerWidth > 992 ) {
var headerLogo = document.querySelector( '.header__logo-container' ) .cloneNode( true );
var headerInfo = document.querySelector( '.header__info' ) .cloneNode( true );
var div = document.createElement('div')

div.classList.add('logo_cont');
document.querySelector( '.header__bottom-inner-container ' ).prepend( div )
document.querySelector( '.logo_cont ' ).prepend( headerInfo );
document.querySelector( '.logo_cont ' ).prepend( headerLogo );
}

$( '.header__nav a' ).on( 'click', function( ) {
  var anchor = $( this ).attr( 'href' ).split( '#' );
  if( anchor[ 1 ] && anchor[ 1 ] === 'signin' ) {
    $( '#sign-in-modal' ).modal( );
  }
} );

$( '.header__bottom-actions a' ).on( 'click', function( ) {
  var anchor = $( this ).attr( 'href' ).split( '#' );
  if( anchor[ 1 ] && anchor[ 1 ] === 'signin' ) {
    $( '#sign-in-modal' ).modal( );
  }
} );

var title = $('.header__bottom-block .header__info-title');
$('.header__bottom-block .header__info-title').remove();
$('.header__bottom-block .header__info').prepend(title);

$( window ).on( 'load', function( ) {
  $( '.platformpage-search-search .js-big-cards' ).trigger( 'click' );
} );
  </script>
